summary: This Mod adds Navi along with a Zelda inspired Armor set and Player home.
descriptionHtml:
It\'s Navi! 

She will follow you and give you quests.

She can be found in the entryway of Dragonsreach in Whiterun. 

--------------

Details:
She is marked as essential (can\'t die). 
She can carry your things.
You can hire her for free. 
If you dismiss her she will stay there, so you can put her in your house or where ever you want. 
She gives bounty quests.
Added Link\'s Armor in Smithing.
Added Navi\'s Hideaway just outside of Riverwood.  

Warning:

Mods alter the game, (by design).

If you uninstall a mod without dismissing the follower from that mod the game will still think you have a follower and you will be unable to hire another. 

It is a good practice to make a save before trying new mods and/or save without any of the mod components attached to your character, i.e. Followers, Armor, Zones, Quests, Spells. 

Command Console: Dismiss Follower (set playerfollowercount to 0) 

Any feedback is appreciated. 

Cheers!

v1.1Update: Now with 100% less annoying sound. 

v1.2Update: Added cartable Link\'s Armor.
-Under Misc. in Smithing. Can be made at base Smithing; needs Elven Smithing Perk to upgrade 
-Tunic looks like a dress for women characters, (sorry). 

v1.2.1Update: Fixed and issue where Link\'s Hood was not displaying properly. 

v1.2.2Update: Navi can now take damage. She will take a knee when her health reaches 0.

v1.2.3Update: Tweaked Link\'s Armor to work better with Light Armor perks. 
-Navi can now carry the same weight as other followers. 

v1.3Update: Added \"Navi\'s Hideaway.\"  A new Player House outside of Riverwood.  
-It has Cooking, Enchanting, Alchemy, and a nice place to sleep. 
-Plenty of storage for your adventuring needs.  

v1.3.1Update: Added a terrace to Navi\'s Hideaway, to meet the adventure\'s Smithing and Smelting needs.  

v1.3.2Update: Navi is now free to hire and re-hire.

v1.3.3Update: Fixed an issue with the Navmesh in Navi\'s Hideaway

Awesome flute playing picture via perplexmachine\'s \"Playable Flute, Lute and Drum - Play and Bash,\" mod.
author: BobitoZ
